question: Which two water bodies form the starting point and the ending point respectively of the "Camino de Costa Rica" hiking trail?
explanation: The Atlantic Ocean and the Pacific Ocean form the starting point and the ending point respectively of the Camino de Costa Rica hiking trail. It is a hiking-adventure trail to explore the rural communities, different ecosystems, indigenous cultures, flora and fauna varieties of Costa Rica. Its overall aim is the rural development of Costa Rica. Each year it is attracting the participation of tourists from all over the world.
